entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:05 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:05 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
